channel.title: Reality or mezzyscape
channel.description:
does sameone have one of those with fixed pvn dc combat bug fix? :D lol, i know what this is to much for asking but still, or I going to rip noobish (PI) or battlescape combat out of it to fix my problem :), anyway paladino(combat) is priority.
with renoobish, crazyfagg.
damm i need shard with perfect combat... the point is of that :'(, rsource is for gays, 377d is for cool guys with some expierence, shard is for ppl who want to move from pi to samthing bigger, whats waht i do think, couse rs..2006 ruined runesource, its like 2nd pi now :'(
